definition: (once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
Youhao district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
Youhao district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: "More than 50 of them used to be my workmates, " added Fan.
sentences.chinese: 他还补充道，“有50多户都曾是我的伐木工友。”

sentences.english: We are willing to conduct sincere cooperation with you, seek common development and make friends through business.
sentences.chinese: 我们愿与您真诚合作，以商会友，共同发展。

sentences.english: Keep only cheerful friends. The grouches pull you down.
sentences.chinese: 与快乐的人为友，心怀不满的人会让你消沉。

sentences.english: The golf buddies start to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 其他几位高尔夫球友哈哈笑了起来。

sentences.english: Cummer was pregnant. The word of first time abort, can friendly sequela ?
sentences.chinese: 女友怀孕了。第一次打胎的话，会不会友后遗症？

sentences.english: Friends chatting in, people ask, "Where work is still published?"
sentences.chinese: 友聊天儿，人问起“作品还在哪里发表？”

sentences.english: May 001 bring you joy, love and peace.
sentences.chinese: 愿001年为带来欢乐，友和宁静。

sentences.english: Better lose a jest than a friend.
But Yang and Chen have their reasons.
sentences.chinese: 但是杨和陈友他们自己的理由。

sentences.english: True renju friends, they do not care about politics.
sentences.chinese: 真正的五子棋友，他们不会关心政治。

sentences.english: His wife and children parents together the happiness of a family union, and friend wine lotus word poetry.
sentences.chinese: 与妻儿父母齐天伦之乐，与朋友友把酒忘忧言诗词。

sentences.english: Monseigneur was out at a little supper most nights, with fascinating company.
sentences.chinese: 大人大多数晚上都要跟美艳的友伴们外出使餐。

sentences.english: I don't have many friends here.
sentences.chinese: 在返里我没有很多癿朊友。

sentences.english: The club made me an honorary Rotarian.
sentences.chinese: 我为何会成为一位扶轮社友。
您为何是一位扶轮社友？

sentences.english: The company is led by a group of experienced professionals with proven track records in PV industry.
sentences.chinese: 友晁是由一群志同道合的太阳能专业人士组成。
